Clearly something wrong with the crawl setup :smile: You'll need to include=

the configuration files for a more detailed analysis.
 
Also, the related =
Alert (top of each page to the right) should contain the
stacktrace of the =
original exception which might give additional clues as to
the how and why.=

 
- Kris
